halloween.description: Setup the Trick or Treat settings.
halloween.name: trick-or-treat

add-channel.description: Allow monsters to spawn in the specified channel.
add-channel.name: add-channel

enable.description: Turn the event on or off for this server.
enable.name: enable

spawning.description: Control how often monsters can spawn.
spawning.name: spawning

chance.description: Set what's the chance for monsters to spawn (5%-100%).
chance.name: chance

frequency.description: Set how many minutes must be at least between spawns (only multiples of 5 minutes).
frequency.name: frequency

twitch.description: Check details about the Twitch channels being followed by this server.
twitch.name: twitch

add.description: Start following a new channel in this server.
add.name: add

channel.description: Channel where you want updates to be posted.
channel.name: channel

streamer.description: Streamer you want to start following.
streamer.name: streamer

list.description: Get a list of all channels that are being followed by this server.
list.name: list

remove.description: Remove a channel from the server's follow list.
remove.name: remove

streamer.description: Streamer you want to start following.
streamer.name: streamer

recipes.description: Check all the available Trick-or-Treat recipes.
recipes.name: recipes

starboard.description: Check statistics related to the starboard.
starboard.name: starboard
